creator: bli@tadi.com
text:
I am trying to retrieve user certificate from IIS 5.0 with Tomcat 3.2.3 and SSL.
 
I've setup IIS to require "Client Certificate".  Also, made the proper 
configurations on my browser with user certificate.
 
During execution, IIS did not give any error message of no user certificate.  
However, my servlet was not able to retrieve the user certificate.
 
The code:
X509Certificate[] certs = (X509Certificate[]) req.getAttribute
("javax.servlet.request.X509Certificate");
 
returns NULL.

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
Some SSL fixes are done in 3.3 and few more in j-t-c ( part of mod_jk, jserv is
no longer supported ). Try with j-t-c, if it doesn't work - later, in j-t-c.
